name: Challenge Tour
description:
This is a wonderful world.

When you open your eyes, you will find that there is only yourself in this world.

No one else. There are no monsters either.

There is no extra upgrade system.

You need to follow the task requirements

Find and collect all energy balls.

Carefully search every corner

Ensure completion of tasks.

Game features:

1. The game scenes are extremely realistic, creating a fairytale like world.

2. Excellent scenery and 3D effects bring players an excellent gaming experience.

3. Please observe carefully and make sure not to miss any corners. It could be anywhere
